Detailed Description

A COLLADA physics tapered cylinder.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

FCDPASTaperedCylinder::FCDPASTaperedCylinder (  FCDocument *  document  ) 
 

Constructor: do not use directly.

Create new analytical geometries by using FCDPhysicsShape::CreateAnalyticalGeometry function.

Parameters:
document The COLLADA document that contains this physics tapered cylinder.

Copies the physics tapered cylinder into a clone.

Parameters:
